title: How does payment work for one of your sites?
body: For the monthly plan, you will pay once the transaction has been accepted, for the single payment - payment will be requested before the website is pushed to your chosen domain

title: Do you accept any refunds or discounts?
body: No refunds for our monthly plan however you may cancel before your next monthly payment, for the single payment - refunds are only considered within 7 days of the website being published

title: How long does this process take?
body: Monthly plan subscribers will get high priority over other orders which usually takes 4 - 7 working days for completion.

title: Are your websites accessible friendly?
body: All of our websites are created with mobile & disability accessability in mind, being accessible to all users is a requirement on all of our products.

title: How much do you take for commerce sites?
body: On any website created that accepts payment, we will take 25% per transaction made

title: What do you mean by weekly maintenance?
body: For our monthly plan subscribers, weekly maintenance consists of updating software to keep up to date as well as optimising performance should it slow for any reason
